track.name: Concierto De Aranjuez (Adagio)
comments: well i'll just be adding this to my "Loved" tracks right about now
Hermosa interpretacion, puro sentimiento y maravillosa tecnica. Sublime
Will never grow tired of listening to Miles.  Never.
[2]this is one of those songs that i will listen to until the day i die.
this reminds me when it is late night in a restraunt in spain very relaxing
Every second breathes the absolute soul of Spain, incredible piece of music.
this is one of those songs that i will listen to until the day i die.
this is Jazz at its best ever.
this song is pure genius. i want to make a short film about an old retired bull fighter who wants to get in the arena for one last dance...for the glory!
So evocative I count myself lucky indeed to have been around !!!
